title: Unable to build qt on macOS with clang
body:
There are quite a few errors, so it's hard to tell which one is the important one:
```
$ grep error: spack-build.out
> clang: error: invalid linker name in argument '-fuse-ld=gold'
> fatal error: error in backend: Do not know how to split the result of this operator!
> clang: error: clang frontend command failed with exit code 70 (use -v to see invocation)
> /private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-29/test_keep_exceptions0/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-FGESn3/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.9.1/qtbase/config.tests/unix/libudev/libudev.cpp:40:10: fatal error: 'libudev.h' file not found
```
